name: dynamodb-singletable-poc
description: A proof of concept demonstrating DynamoDB single table design patterns

scripts.stack:deploy: sh -c 'AWS_CLI_AUTO_PROMPT=off ./scripts/with-env.sh aws --no-cli-pager --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation deploy --template-file infrastructure/dynamodb-stack.yml --stack-name dynamodb-singletable --region eu-west-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides Environment=local'
scripts.stack:delete: sh -c 'AWS_CLI_AUTO_PROMPT=off ./scripts/with-env.sh aws --no-cli-pager --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name dynamodb-singletable --region eu-west-1'
scripts.stack:status: sh -c 'AWS_CLI_AUTO_PROMPT=off ./scripts/with-env.sh aws --no-cli-pager --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name dynamodb-singletable --region eu-west-1'
scripts.stack:wait-delete: sh -c 'AWS_CLI_AUTO_PROMPT=off ./scripts/with-env.sh aws --no-cli-pager --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name dynamodb-singletable --region eu-west-1 || true'
scripts.demo:all: npm run demo:seed && npm run demo:examples
